page.title: 06Our Football Team
page.content: Last term a member of the P.T.A came to school to train the football team. He came every day he could but his work disturbed this. .He decided to pick the team two weeks before our first major match.The team was:Craig Irving,Colin Warrick,Graeme Dorrance Kevin Miller,Richard Burnett and Eugene Mason .The first game was away and we played 2 games.Fortunately we won both our games.The first one we won 3_0 Richard scored 2,Eugene scored 1 goal.We also won 2_0Richard and Steven scored against Eaglesfield.We played two friendly games after that.The first one we played Brydekirk we won 8_0.We played Eaglesfield indoors. There pitch was waterlogged. We won 4 games and lost 0 games at the end of the season. B,OGILVIE AND BY G,DORRANCE
